sqlMap.select: SELECT CATEGORY_CD FROM CATEGORY_MST WHERE CATEGORY_ABBREV IS NOT NULL
SELECT CATEGORY_NAME FROM CATEGORY_MST WHERE CATEGORY_CD = #category_cd# AND CATEGORY_ABBREV IS NOT NULL
SELECT DISTINCT ITEM_CD FROM ITEM_MST WHERE CATEGORY_CD = #category_cd# AND DELETE_FG IS NULL AND NO_USE_FG IS NULL ORDER BY ITEM_CD ASC

SELECT DTL.CATEGORY_CD AS category_cd, DTL.ITEM_CD AS item_cd, DTL.LINK_TO_IMAGE AS link_to_image, DTL.IMAGE_NAME AS image_name, DTL.IMAGE_SIZE AS image_size, DTL.LINK_TO_PDF AS link_to_pdf, DTL.PDF_NAME AS pdf_name, DTL.PDF_SIZE AS pdf_size, DTL.REMARK as remark, CATE.CATEGORY_NAME AS category_name, ITEM.ITEM_NAME AS item_name FROM ITEM_DTL_MST DTL LEFT JOIN CATEGORY_MST CATE ON DTL.CATEGORY_CD = CATE.CATEGORY_CD LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT ITEM_CD, ITEM_NAME FROM ITEM_MST) ITEM ON DTL.ITEM_CD = ITEM.ITEM_CD WHERE DTL.ITEM_CD = #item_cd# AND DTL.CATEGORY_CD = #category_cd#
SELECT DISTINCT ITEM_NAME FROM ITEM_MST WHERE ITEM_CD = #item_cd# AND CATEGORY_CD = #category_cd# AND DELETE_FG IS NULL AND NO_USE_FG IS NULL
